content: स्तन् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (स्तनति, स्तनयतिते, स्तनित) {@--1@} To sound, make a sound, resound, reverberate. {@--2@} To groan, breathe hard, sigh. {@--3@} To thunder, roar loudly; तस्तनुर्जज्वलुर्मग्लुर्जग्लुर्लुलुठिरे क्षताः <ls>Bk. 14. 30.</ls> --WITH. नि {1} to sound. {2} to sigh. {3} to mourn. --वि to roar.
